title: UAE Central Bank launches world's first sovereign financial cloud with AI for secure digital finance
summary_full: The Central Bank of the UAE has launched the world's first sovereign financial cloud services infrastructure, a secure, AI-powered digital backbone for its financial sector. Developed with Core42, this initiative ensures national control over data, integrates advanced AI for enhanced operations and offers unified multi-cloud management, positioning the UAE as a leader in secure digital finance.
